legal_basis: Immigration Act, R.S.C. 1985, c. I-2, sect. 83(1)
procedural_fairness: proper assessment of credible basis for refugee status
evidence_assessment: no evidence of incompetence or translation issues post-hearing
decision_reasoning: no legal errors in the tribunal's process or decision
result_of_case: Application dismissed; no certification of questions for appeal granted.
application_details: Huynh claimed inadequate Vietnamese interpretation despite accepting it initially. He also alleged ineffective counsel due to counsel's inexperience and failure to object to interpretation.
relevant_statute: Immigration Act, R.S.C. 1985, c. I-2, sect. 83(1)
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed claims of inadequate interpretation, ineffective counsel, and improper evidence weighing.
court_ruling: The Federal Court dismissed the application
